info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 7:34PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Spartanburg, central Cherokee and northwestern Union Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 734 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles south of Gaffney, or near Pacolet Mills, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gaffney, Pacolet, Jonesville, Pacolet Mills, Croft State Park, Cherokee Falls, Draytonville and Thicketty. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
